panel width: 97 characters, 777 pixels
panel height: 23 lines, 525 pixels

22 pixels per character height

window padding width(with tag): 5
window padding height(with tag): 67

dialog padding width: 2
dialog padding height: 39

Font( "細明體", Font.PLAIN, 16 )
